entry.title: News24.com | Remains of 17 missing people recovered in Nepal
entry.summary: The earthquake on 25 April and another one on 12 May killed 8 900 people in Nepal.

entry.title: Landslide near Nepal's popular Annapurna trek route kills 30
entry.summary: Landslides triggered by torrential rain in Nepal swept through villages on Thursday, killing at least 30 people close to the nation's most popular trekking circuit, home ministry officials said.

entry.title: 'I heard a big demonic sound'; Deadly landslides in Nepal [Photos]
entry.summary: Two powerful earthquakes in Nepal this year that killed almost 9,000 people have raised the risk of landslides across the mountainous country during the rainy season, which lasts from June to September.

entry.title: World Briefing: Nepal Temple Halts Animal Sacrifices
entry.summary:
A temple in southern Nepal known for the mass slaughter of animals at a festival every five years has indefinitely banned animal sacrifice, India's Humane Society International said Tuesday.

Those numbers dropped in 2014 after India's Supreme Court banned taking animals across the border to Nepal for sacrifice there, campaigners said.

entry.title: Nepal police arrest 11 in suspected human sacrifice killing of boy
entry.summary: More than 80% of Nepal's 28 million people are Hindus.

entry.title: Boy's murder in Nepal a 'human sacrifice', eleven arrested
entry.summary: Police have arrested 11 villagers over the murder of a 10-year-old boy in southwestern Nepal, in what authorities are calling a case of human sacrifice.

entry.title: Nepal's Mt. Annapurna trails deemed safe after April earthquake
entry.summary:
The most popular trekking trail in Nepal escaped damage during April's devastating earthquake and is safe for hikers to return, an assessment team said Thursday.

The trail around Mount Annapurna gets about 115,000 foreign trekkers, which is about 60 per cent of all hikers who travel to Nepal every year.
